name: Infinite 2d line runner - avoid triangle obstacles - ready for release hypercasual game
name_original: Infinite 2d line runner - avoid triangle obstacles - ready for release hypercasual game
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Main goal is to avoid triangle obstacles as long as you can. Once player hits the triangle obstacle game is over. Square do gradually begin to travel faster and faster as the game progresses
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects.

Thank you!
